entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind light except northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
